title: Bots
body:
Hey Riot can you get your bots in blind/draft/ranked picks to surrender at 15-20mins+ instead of always declining? Would appreciate it.

Cheerio.

replies.body: Double down when you've got nothing to lose. Throw it against the wall. Go for deep level gains over fake pride.
Then turn around when you've got the opportunity to abuse. Don't get low because it ain't all what it's about, just farm those creeps and level your brain up to take that ride out of trouble.
